changeSet.createView: SELECT t.id,t.frozen_box_code,ROWNUM as no, (t.tube_rows||t.tube_columns) as location, t.sample_code,t.sample_type_name,t.gender,t.age,t.disease_type,t.project_code,hb.stock_out_handover_id FROM stock_out_handover_details hd LEFT OUTER JOIN stock_out_handover_box hb on hd.stock_out_handover_box_id = hb.id LEFT OUTER JOIN stock_out_req_frozen_tube bt ON hd.stock_out_req_frozen_tube_id = bt.id LEFT OUTER JOIN frozen_tube t ON bt.frozen_tube_id = t.id
